claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a table of solicited adverse‐event rates (any, moderate, severe) from Flublok clinical studies, with footnotes about data collection and comparators. It contains no text about regulatory approval or the indicated age range for Flublok. There is no mention of ‘approved for adults 18 years and older’ or any age‐related indication in the visible content, so it does not provide evidence for the claim.
